name: HyperBowl Classic
description:
Bowl the eerie and otherwordly settings of the original HyperBowl Classic lane!

Swipe up on the screen to push the ball forward, swipe left or right to push it horizontally, down to roll backwards! Feel free to explore the scenery, but watch your time, and don't gutter!

Pinch to pause. Tip: Use long swipes for more power.

Visit our Facebook page http://hyperbowl.rocks/ for the latest news.

If you like this lane, check out the full HyperBowl app for all of the original and new lanes!

Built with the original HyperBowl art and sound assets licensed from Absolute Certainty Inc., the Unity game engine from Unity Technologies, fonts from Google Fonts and the MacXWare Font Library, iTween from pixelplacement, Lean Localization from Carlos Wilkes, the Universal Accessibility Plugin from Metalpop Games, and Finger Gestures from Fatal Frog Software.

HyperBowl is a registered trademark of Absolute Certainty Inc..
